Privacy Policy

  • 1. Collection of Personal Data

    I collect personal information through the contact form available on this site. This information includes data such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide to allow me to contact you.

  • 2. Use of Personal Data

    The data you provide through the contact form is used solely to contact you back in the context of your request. This information is stored in my database securely and is not shared with third parties.

  • 3. Email Communications

    The collected data may be used to send you emails related to my new services or relevant information regarding my web and mobile development activities. You can unsubscribe from these communications at any time by clicking on the unsubscribe link present in each email.

  • 4. Cookies

    This site does not use cookies. No information is automatically collected via tracking cookies or other similar technologies.

  • 5. Data Protection

    I commit to protecting your personal data by implementing appropriate security measures to prevent any disclosure, loss or alteration of your information. Only authorized persons have access to it and your data is used only for the purposes described in this privacy policy.

  • 6. Data Retention Period

    The personal information collected through the contact form is retained for the time necessary to process your request. It may be retained longer for legal or commercial needs, but it will never be retained indefinitely without your explicit consent.

  • 7. Your Rights

    In accordance with current regulations, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

    • Right of access: You can request a copy of the personal information I hold about you.
    • Right of rectification: You can request the correction of any incorrect or incomplete information.
    • Right to erasure: You can request the deletion of your personal data under certain conditions.
    • Right to object: You can object to the use of your data for direct marketing purposes.

  • 8. Contact

    If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy or if you wish to exercise your rights, please do not hesitate to contact me at the following address: info@helveclick.ch.

  • 9. Modifications of the Privacy Policy

    This privacy policy may be updated from time to time. Any modification will be published on this page.
